snippet: The generation of power from coal in the United States fell to the lowest monthly level in 35 years in November 2015 as generators switched to natural gas.
abstract: Energy Information Admin reports natural gas surpassed coal as main source of power in United States for fifth month in row in November.
lead_paragraph: The generation of power from coal in the United States fell to the lowest monthly level in 35 years in November 2015 as generators switched to natural gas.

headline.main: Gas Eclipses Coal as Source of Power for 5th Straight Month
headline.print_headline: Gas Eclipses Coal as Source of Power for 5th Straight Month
